title: The Catalyst Story by Adatruth
description: Voters need accessible, insightful + digestible educational resources to learn about 150+ funded Catalyst project's progress and the system.
solution: Creating insightful, educational, pro-video stories about some Catalyst funded proposals, which inspire newcomers to join and learn more.
experience:
\- 15 years of TV & Film – mostly documentaries  
\- Several festival awards for editing  
\- Best Documentary Film Award (2020)  
\- Educator
